Description:
A dropshot variant of the Rocket labs Basin map. Score in the goals and don't fall through the floor!

[h2] Mutators [/h2]
Recommended mutators are: 
[list]
    [*]Boost: unlimited / fast recharge
    [*]Gamemode: dropshot
[/list]

[h2] Credits [/h2]
Huge thanks to Martinn for all the decryption tools and Lethamyr for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=157328145]the template[/url] for this map
